title: ADIFF 2015 - Black / Nwa
desc: (NY PREMIERE) BLACK is a ?Hood? film set in Montreal, Canada that chronicles the lives of four people living in a neighborhood plagued by poverty and violence, aspiring to freedom and happiness.?KADHAFI, a 26 year-old aspiring Algerian rapper and ex-member of a street gang, just out of prison, wants to steer clear of troubles. FLEUR, a 17 year-old Haitian mother in an abusive and passionate relationship with her daughter?s father, dreams of leaving the ghetto and becoming a nurse. SUZIE, a 20-year-old white stripper who falls for a gang member.?DICKENS, 16 year-old Haitian wants to be part of the street gang controlled by his older brother. Directed by Yves Christian Fournier, 2015, Canada, Drama, 110 min, French/Creole with English subtitles
